title: hoopstagaloop
author: hoopstagaloop
content: Want to buy satori coin graded anacs or pcgs

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: slimzak can you share here? cant dm

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: I have a very rare low four digit serial 5### with the red sunburst in the middle of the hologram, prior to the orange sunburst. It is ICG slabbed. Open to offers/trades.

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: Quote from: slimzak on April 03, 2023, 10:26:09 PMHere you go.can we do this on escrow service?

comments.author: slimzak
comments.body: Yes sure, we can use mj escrow

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: yes we do escrow with mj first i will ask him if possible.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Nothing wrong with using escrow but slimzak is a trusted member. I’ve done a deal or 2 and had no issues at all. Well packaged and delivered quickly. If you click on the word “trust” it shows feedback and dates of that feedback. Great way to see if someone is trustworthy.

comments.author: slimzak
comments.body: Thanks for the kind words Precious. Chip shipped to mj as requested

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: yeah thankyou slimzak! my account is just new here, so i can’t dm. But since were okay with mj escrow were all good. yeah slimzak is legit.

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: Quote from: Spokanistan51 on April 03, 2023, 10:25:49 PMI have a very rare low four digit serial 5### with the red sunburst in the middle of the hologram, prior to the orange sunburst. It is ICG slabbed. Open to offers/trades.how much you like to sell it?

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: Tough to price. I have only seen one Satori with a serial lower than 5### on here from a well known collector. Open to offers or trades. Quote from: hoopstagaloop on April 05, 2023, 02:46:56 AMQuote from: Spokanistan51 on April 03, 2023, 10:25:49 PMI have a very rare low four digit serial 5### with the red sunburst in the middle of the hologram, prior to the orange sunburst. It is ICG slabbed. Open to offers/trades.how much you like to sell it?

It is ICG slabbed. Open to offers/trades.how much you like to sell it?can you do 0.01 BTC?

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: I couldn’t go that low, sorry. Would take a huge loss. Note the red sunburst in the middle vs. the typical orange on higher serials.https://imgur.com/a/r2SMY2RHere is a thread about the serials:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5420458.msg61273738#msg61273738Quote from: hoopstagaloop on April 05, 2023, 03:20:27 AMQuote from: Spokanistan51 on April 05, 2023, 03:07:40 AMTough to price. comments.author: slimzak
comments.body: hoopstagaloop,The Satori chip has been delivered to MJ. Please go ahead and make the payment to the address provided in your DMs so the transaction can be completed. Thanks.
